weka.server
Interface NamedTask

All Superinterfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Task
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClassifierPanelRemoteLauncher.ClassifierTask, ScheduledNamedKFTask, UnscheduledNamedKFTask, WekaTaskMap.NamedClassDelegator, WekaTaskMap.SimpleNamedTask
public interface NamedTask
extends Task

Extension of the Task interface for tasks with a name/ID. Also adds some methods for memory management.

Version:
$Revision: 47640 $
Author:
Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)

Method Summary
 void freeMemory()
          Tell the task that it can free any resources (memory, results etc.) that would not be needed for another execution run.

          Get the name of this task

          Tell the task that it should load any stored resources from disk into memory.

          Tell the task to load its result object (if it has one) from disk (if it has persisted it in order to save memory).

Methods inherited from interface weka.experiment.Task
execute, getTaskStatus
 

Method Detail

stop

void stop()
Stop the currently running task (if possible). Does nothing if the task is not currently executing.

setName

void setName(java.lang.String name)
Set the name of this task

Parameters:
name - the name of this task

getName

java.lang.String getName()
Get the name of this task

Returns:
the name of this task

freeMemory

void freeMemory()
Tell the task that it can free any resources (memory, results etc.) that would not be needed for another execution run.

persistResources

void persistResources()
Tell the task that it should persist any resources to disk (e.g. training data, etc.). WekaServer.getTempFile() can be used to get a file to save to.

loadResources

void loadResources()
Tell the task that it should load any stored resources from disk into memory.

loadResult

void loadResult()
                throws java.lang.Exception
Tell the task to load its result object (if it has one) from disk (if it has persisted it in order to save memory). This method is called when a client has requested to fetch the result.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if the result can't be loaded for some reason

purge

void purge()
Tell the task to delete any disk-based resources.
